Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

constructor.custom:error: ZeroAddressNotAllowed is thrown if resilient oracle address is null

returns._0: USD price in scaled decimal places

params.externalPrices: an array of prices for other assets

returns._0: USD price in scaled decimal places

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setOracle(address,address).custom:error: ZeroAddressNotAllowed is thrown if asset address is null
setOracle(address,address).details: The production resilientOracle will be used if zero address is passed

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

ZeroAddressNotAllowed().notice: Thrown if the supplied address is a zero address where it is not allowed

OracleConfigured(address,address).notice: Event emitted when an oracle is set

PRICES_SLOT().notice: Slot to temporarily store price information from external sources like CMC/Coingecko, useful to compute prices of derivative assets based on prices of the base assets with no on chain price information

constructor.notice: Constructor for the implementation contract. Sets immutable variables.

getPriceAssuming(address,(address,uint25.notice: Gets price of the asset assuming other assets have the defined price

setOracle(address,address).notice: Sets an oracle to use for a specific asset

userdoc.notice: Reference oracle is the oracle that is not used for production but required for price monitoring. This oracle contains some extra configurations for assets required to compute reference prices of their derivative assets (OneJump, ERC4626, Pendle, etc.)
